meanings.definition: Lacking sensitivity or refinement; gross or vulgar.
meanings.sent1: The crassest behavior at the party was when he burped loudly without excusing himself.
meanings.sent2: Her crassest comment made everyone uncomfortable at the dinner table.
meanings.sent3: Despite his crassest jokes, he always managed to make people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The crassest language in the movie shocked the audience.
meanings.sent5: The crassest manners she displayed were unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Showing no intelligence or sensitivity; grossly insensible.
meanings.sent1: It was the crassest mistake to leave the keys in the car with the engine running.
meanings.sent2: The crassest decision he made was to trust a stranger with his money.
meanings.sent3: Despite his crassest blunders, he always managed to find a way out.
meanings.sent4: The crassest error in judgment cost him his job.
meanings.sent5: Her crassest oversight led to a series of unfortunate events.
